pages.text: Void of the Agglomerate can make the caster in a state of low presence, and will not be targeted by some creatures unless you want to kiss it. $(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Duration can increase gains)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration$(/t)$()$(br)Void of the Agglomerate can also mine blocks.
